title.narrative: Moldova Partnerships for Sustainable Civil Society (MPSCS)

description.narrative: (Moldova): MPSCS engages in capacity-building of civil society to represent citizens' interests, influence policymaking, and safeguard civil society's democratic role in Moldova. MPSCS will strengthen Moldovan civil society organizations (CSOs), CSO networks, and engagement between CSOs and the Moldovan government to contribute to a more vibrant and effective civil society sector in Moldova. MPSCS works to improve the capacity of civil society in Moldova to represent citizens' interests, influence policymaking, and sustain the sector's democratic role for the future. In the final year of implementation, the activity will focus on consolidating the results achieved in creating a more favorable environment for Moldovan CSOs, and for improving CSO institutional and advocacy capacities and their financial viability so that their impact can be sustained beyond the life of the project. Specifically, the activity will focus on advancing relevant legislation and strategies, such as assisting stakeholders to approve and start implementing the Civil Society Development Strategy for 2017-2020 and providing recommendations to authorities to finalize the Law on Social Entrepreneurship and to improve the regulations on CSOs' social contracting. In addition, USAID will prioritize closing-out all partner CSOs' grants and sharing their successful advocacy activities with other Moldovan CSOs through closeout events; and reaching out to over 500,000 Moldovans by disseminating TV spots highlighting partner CSOs' achievements, to amplify partner CSOs' messaging and to improve civil society's visibility and credibility.
